verbs.description: The [V: ranking] [ARG1: Democrat] on the Senate Finance Committee is accusing the Treasury Department of refusing to provide documents and information related to President Donald Trump 's longtime lawyer Michael Cohen and his relationship with the Swiss drug company Novartis .
